body_html:
so i pulled latest and built again using --cxxopt="-D_GLIBCXX_USE_CXX11_ABI=0" and now I cannot even import tensorflow. It fails with this error
ImportError: /home/karun/anaconda3/bin/../lib/libstdc++.so.6: version `CXXABI_1.3.8' not found (required by /home/karun/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/tensorflow/python/_pywrap_tensorflow_internal.so)

is gcc 5 compatible?

body:
so i pulled latest and built again using --cxxopt="-D_GLIBCXX_USE_CXX11_ABI=0" and now I cannot even import tensorflow. It fails with this error
ImportError: /home/karun/anaconda3/bin/../lib/libstdc++.so.6: version `CXXABI_1.3.8' not found (required by /home/karun/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/tensorflow/python/_pywrap_tensorflow_internal.so)
